statusLine.command: input=$(cat); current_dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); model_display_name=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); dir_name=$(basename "$current_dir"); if git -C "$current_dir" rev-parse --is-inside-work-tree >/dev/null 2>&1; then branch=$(git -C "$current_dir" branch --show-current 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$branch" ]; then if ! git -C "$current_dir" diff-index --quiet HEAD -- 2>/dev/null; then git_info=" git:($branch) ✗"; else git_info=" git:($branch)"; fi; else git_info=""; fi; else git_info=""; fi; printf "➜ %s [%s]%s" "$dir_name" "$model_display_name" "$git_info"
